alert.note: Alert for Crowley; Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 23 at 5:33AM MDT until June 24 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River Near Nepesta affecting Pueblo County. Arkansas River At La Junta affecting Otero County. Arkansas River Near Fowler affecting Otero and Crowley Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River NEAR Avondale affecting Pueblo County. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Pueblo, Avondale, Nepesta, Fowler, Rocky Ford, La Junta, Lamar...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River Near Fowler. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.5 feet, Minor Flood. Minor agricultural flooding occurs northeast of Rocky Ford and elsewhere. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 AM MDT Friday the stage was 12.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to flood stage this evening. It will then fall to 11.8 feet early Monday morning. It will rise to 11.9 feet Tuesday evening. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 13.5 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 645 AM MDT.
